attributes.action: Demand that Penny Mourdant as MP
attributes.additional_details:
You should sign this petition if you think that Penny Mordaunt's alleged abuse of our political system and recent behaviour in Parliament have brought shame on women everywhere who have struggled for equality and the right to have a say on how the country is run.

I believe Ms Mourdant should resign or be removed as  Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department for Communities and Local Government.
